entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Winchester
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 12:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain showers and flurries this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
